pages.title: The Lightroom
pages.text: A tool that allows one to print photos, the Lightroom is a Photographer's second best friend. It requires Paper, black dye to print B&W Photos, and cyan, magenta and yellow dye to print colored photos off of respective reels. To render a reel, you must first combine it with a number of unbrewed potion varieties. It's process can be automated through redstone applications.
